features: 3-PACK OF LAVENDER FABRIC SOFTENER - Bleu Lavande liquid fabric softener contains 99.1% natural origin ingredients. It combines a plant-based softening agent and the purifying properties of lavender. This fabric softener also reduces static while adding an amazing softness to clothes

2X CONCENTRATED FABRIC SOFTENER - This laundry fabric softener is 2X more concentrated than standard softeners and will last up to 38 loads per unit. Add it to your HE washing machine dispenser or during the final rinse. It is efficient in cold water and suitable for all types of washing machines

ABOUT BLEU LAVANDE - At Bleu Lavande, we love lavender so much that we even grow it! Since its foundation in 2004, the Bleu Lavande product portfolio reflects our desire for well-being, purity, and authenticity

SAFE AND NATURAL INGREDIENTS - All our products are made with the highest quality ingredients and do not contain artificial fragrances, parabens, sulfates, PEGs, or dyes. This product is biodegradable (301D standards of the OECD), eco-friendly, hypoallergenic, and chloride and phosphate-free
CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE - We are proud to be certified cruelty-free by PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals). None of our products are tested on animals

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have VERY sensitive skin, am allergic to a variety of natural and chemical ingredients (e.g., formaldehyde) and this fabric softener does not cause me ANY irritation at all! It doesn't contain harsh or toxic ingredients in fabric softeners that cause allergic reactions for me. I'll be buying this brand from now on! This fabric softener smells so natural and fresh, with a soft lavender scent that is unlike the chemically scents in other brands. My clothes are left soft with a subtle, clean lavender fragrance. Another benefit is that even if I use a lot of the product on items that air dry which I want to feel very soft, such as a throw blanket or sweater, the liquid does not leave residue or marks on fabric and rinses out properly. The price is great for the amount you receive as well. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Scent & Soft Towels
reviews.reviewText: I like using more natural fabric softeners but unfortunately one of my faves is no longer available, so I thought I would try Bleu Lavande. Before I took off the cap I could smell lavender and was afraid it might be too much scent, but the softener is concentrated and when towels were dry there was just the faintest scent.They were also quite soft with no waxy feeling like some of the non-natural softeners. I like that it's concentrated and I use less, so that is a plus too. So far I am happy with the performance so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great scent, a little pricey
reviews.reviewText: We love the scent of this product, but it’s not the most affordable solution. It would be nice to find a bulk size given the volume of laundry our family does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product does a good job softening your clothes and the smell of lavender is absolutely wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent and it works great for my work clothes which smell like fish!
reviews.reviewText: I am a fish monger and spend all day cutting and throwing fish at Pike Place Fish Market. I have a separate hamper for my laundry so my fish clothes don't make my regular clothes smell. My clothes smell like fresh fish, but ultimately they still smell like fish. I have tried SEVERAL sustainable and natural softeners and detergents and this is the first one that I really like that is at a price point that I can live with. This pairs really well with the lavender laundry detergent I used and my work clothes feel soft and smell great. If they work for my fish clothes, they will totally work for people with normal laundry! I recommend this and plan to use it over and over. Totally worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT SOFTEN towels or clothes.
reviews.reviewText: I love lavender. I use a laundry detergent called "ZUM" in a lavender scent (sold on Amazon, check it out, GOOD STUFF!). My washer is very efficient though and there isn't a lot of the scent left in the clothes or towels after. I wanted to build on Zum's lavender scent so I looked around at fabric softeners that were purely lavender scented. Reviews on this looked good so I bought 3 bottles. Smells good in the bottle. I added to my washer's softener area and expected more of the lavender infusion after the load of clothes was done. No, I couldn't tell any difference. And, to me, the clothes didn't have the usual softness I get just using over the counter Downey softeners. The next load was towels. I do like them SOFT. I decided to fill a "Downey ball" with this softener to give it more of a chance because of the sheer volume of liquid going in. My towels are NEVER hard! These felt UNTOUCHED by a softener product. I tried to convince myself to give it more of a try... but after doing more towels there's just no denying it... this product DOES NOT SOFTEN towels at all. And the lavender scent does not remain over what I get with just the ZUM detergent. I consider the product misrepresented and useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!!
reviews.reviewText: Hands down best lavender scent. Not overpowering and adds a nice softness to my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like it but....
reviews.reviewText: Very expensive for 3 littler bottles...smells great but it doesn't roll over to the dried laundry :(

Very happy with this fabric softener! The lavender scent is perfect! Smells great! Works great removing pet hair from our clothes. I use 1/2 a cupful per load and may try reducing that a bit more! A little goes a long way! Will definitely order again! 😁

We all know we have to spend a little extra for quality and THIS is totally worth it in my quest to use more natural products. Don't be deceived by the small bottles as a little goes a long way. The lavender scent seems strong in the bottle but is the perfect amount for your clothes. I use wool dryer balls in the dryer and my clothes are just as soft and lint free as they were when using Downy or Gain fabric softeners. For the record I've been making my own lavender laundry detergent and this fabric softener is the perfect compliment.
Great product, house smells heavenly when Laundering, clothes soft with beautiful scent 😍
Smells good but doesn't make towels fluffy like regular fabric softener. Bottles were smaller than I expected for the price.
Très bon produit. Je l’utilise pour mes lavages délicats.
